title: A Night with the Society Playboy
description: Once Ava Halliburton shared a tender night of passion with Caleb Gilchrist. The next day, she left—not to return for ten years….But now she's home for a wedding. And Caleb's the best richer and sexier than ever, with a playboy reputation.Caleb still wants her. But Ava walked out on him, and he's no gentleman. One night, and then he'll be the one to walk away….
author: Ally Blake
